member.name: T:Jupiter.MemoryProtection
member.summary: Defines the protection to be applied to a region of virtual memory

member.name: F:Jupiter.MemoryProtection.ZeroAccess
member.summary: Disables all access to the region of virtual memory

member.name: F:Jupiter.MemoryProtection.NoAccess
member.summary: Disables all access to the region of virtual memory

member.name: F:Jupiter.MemoryProtection.ReadOnly
member.summary: Marks the region of virtual memory as readable

member.name: F:Jupiter.MemoryProtection.ReadWrite
member.summary: Marks the region of virtual memory as readable and/or writable

member.name: F:Jupiter.MemoryProtection.WriteCopy
member.summary: Marks the region of virtual memory as readable and/or copy on write

member.name: F:Jupiter.MemoryProtection.Execute
member.summary: Marks the region of virtual memory as executable

member.name: F:Jupiter.MemoryProtection.ExecuteRead
member.summary: Marks the region of virtual memory as readable and/or executable

member.name: F:Jupiter.MemoryProtection.ExecuteReadWrite
member.summary: Marks the region of virtual memory as readable, writable and/or executable

member.name: F:Jupiter.MemoryProtection.ExecuteWriteCopy
member.summary: Marks the region of virtual memory as readable, copy on write and/or executable

member.name: F:Jupiter.MemoryProtection.Guard
member.summary: Marks the region of virtual memory as guarded

member.name: F:Jupiter.MemoryProtection.ReadWriteGuard
member.summary: Marks the region of virtual memory as readable, writable and guarded

member.name: F:Jupiter.MemoryProtection.NoCache
member.summary: Marks the region of virtual memory as non-cacheable
